casebody.data:
Clayton Platt, Appellant v. The Pennsylvania Railroad Co., Respondent. Decided November 3, 1890. Appeal from a judgment dismissing the complaint on the report of a referee. Nathaniel A. Prentiss, for appellant. Robinson, Scribner & Bright, for respondent.

Before Freedman and Truax, J J.

The only question involved was one of fact, and the judgment was affirmed, with costs, on the opinion of the referee.
